strapiPost.title: Fresh Grass Festival Coming 2022
strapiPost.photoCredit: Edward C Robison, courtesy of the Momentary
strapiPost.content:
This past fall the Fresh Grass Festival was a huge success out at The Momentary, and it is set to return this spring. 

  • Back again: The celebrated music festival will be at the Momentary on May 20-21, 2022 for 2 days of family friendly bluegrass and roots music. Performances will be on multiple stages across the Momentary accompanied by activities for all ages. 
  • Line-up: Headlining artists will be announced in the coming months, but tickets for the general public go on sale Monday, Dec.20. Early bird tickets go on sale today at 10a. 

Stay tuned for more info HERE.
